授業目的: This seminar is targeted to 3rd and 4th year GCaP students. Seven intensive lectures are held in each semester. The course covers a wide range of topics on international policy and global issues, chosen by the GCaP professors. The course is taught in English. The course contents are the same for Spring Term C (1) and Autumn Term C (2). GCaP students are required to take one credit for program completion.
到達目標: This course provides a valuable opportunity for students to deepen their understanding of internationally important themes, develop critical thinking, learn an interdisciplinary approach, and express their ideas using English. Moreover, the course helps students acquire a range of positive attitudes, qualities, and self-motivation essential to working anywhere in the world, and prepare for working as professionals in today’s increasingly global and diverse society.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】GCaP Seminar Ｃ　２（総合政策学部）/合同演習Ｃ　２（総合政策学部）
関連科目: This seminar is targeted to 3rd and 4th year GCaP students.
授業方法: Students are required to attend all the classes. In addition, students have to complete prior readings and assignments, and attend the class with full preparation. Students are required to complete all the assignments given by every professor. Since the method of implementation will vary depending on the faculty member, the details including the assignment will be instructed to the students separately. In principle, this course will be taught ENTIRELY in English. Therefore, students are expected to make an effort to use English. However, professors may provide additional instruction in Japanese to complement the class, depending on the level of understanding of the students. Students may ask questions in Japanese if necessary.
